fields.Title: PLAZA / KORTENAER
fields.Description: Previously known as Scab Leader. Wears a huge and intimidating set of armour. He is drunk and pissed off at his friend getting killed. He carries a big-ass gun.

fields.Title: You: "Think of an argument!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Think of an argument!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "That's all it takes. There is no ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's all it takes. There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant moves, like a spring unloaded. He grabs the gun from your bloody hand and fires behind him.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "You see two cold eyes looking at yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see two cold eyes looking at you -- through all the smoke and the panic. And a pistol, raised, aiming at your chest, point blank. Then the man squeezes the trigger...

fields.Title: You: "No. Let me back into the fight."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Let me back into the fight.
fields.Alternate1: No. Let me back into the fight. Let me save Kim.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "You see two crazed eyes stare at yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see two crazed eyes stare at you -- through the burning meat and the flames. With his face boiling off the man raises his pistol at you. Then he squeezes the trigger...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "You see two crazed eyes stare at yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You see two crazed eyes stare at you -- through all the smoke and the panic. With blood gushing from his face the man raises his pistol at you. Then he squeezes the trigger...

fields.Title: You: "What's going to happen now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's going to happen now?

fields.Title: Empathy: "I think he's calmed down a bit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I think he's calmed down a bit...

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even if it comes to a fight it's a good idea to get under his skin first.

fields.Title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm barely keeping you together here... this is *it*. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

fields.Title: Volition: "DON'T GO INTO SHOCK. HOLD ON."
fields.Dialogue Text: DON'T GO INTO SHOCK. HOLD ON.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The engine of a Coupris Kineema..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The engine of a Coupris Kineema...

fields.Title: Logic: "A sound strategy. He's the leader."
fields.Dialogue Text: A sound strategy. He's the leader.

fields.Title: You: ""Stop, this is the police!" (Get be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stop, this is the police!" (Get between them.)

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "There is a hole in his cheek. Blood..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a hole in his cheek. Blood gushes out as he stumbles backward, eyes filled with rage and disbelief -- gurgling, muttering something unintelligible...
fields.Alternate1: There is a hole in his cheek. He's not smiling anymore. He stumbles backward, eyes filled with disbelief, gurgling, muttering something unintelligible...

fields.Title: You: "Dodge the shot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Dodge the shot.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Is there anything -- *anything* --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Is there anything -- *anything* -- we could use to protect this frail body? That gun will tear us to pieces.

fields.Title: You: "I'm sorry. (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm sorry. (Conclude.)

fields.Title: You: "So... it's not going to hit?"
fields.Dialogue Text: So... it's not going to hit?

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly the grip of your side-arm feels comforting and warm in your hand. Feels like it's saying: Do it!

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "No. You're going to be mowed down b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. You're going to be mowed down by gunfire from the two remaining mercs, so no. Not forever.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Absolute destruction."
fields.Dialogue Text: Absolute destruction.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a fucking failure and the love..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a fucking failure and the love of my life left me."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "He turns to his left and says: "Kil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "This is the scab leader. His chest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the scab leader. His chest rises and falls under the ceramic breastplate. His fingers reach for the butt of his sidearm.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You throw the bomb and it's way off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You throw the bomb and it's way off.

fields.Title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm barely keeping you together here... this is *it*. The big one. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""What's that, loincloth? I can't he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's that, loincloth? I can't hear you. Sounds like you got your mouth full of dick. Ruud..."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out. In the background, the leader staggers...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "A look of happiness. His eyes seem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A look of happiness. His eyes seem unnaturally bright, shining like stars. Something in the fear must distort him somehow. He is evil. And the end.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Warm blood pools underneath you. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Warm blood pools underneath you. It's sticky -- and there's so much of it.

fields.Title: You: ""It said I have a vast soul. Do I h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It said I have a vast soul. Do I have a... vast soul?"

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "To your right, the killer raises hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To your right, the killer raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His moves are steady, but the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...
fields.Alternate1: The porcelain man raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His hands are steady, and the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Have mercy on yourself. Take the do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Have mercy on yourself. Take the door.

fields.Title: Glen: "Glen -- dying in a puddle of blood..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Glen -- dying in a puddle of blood behind you. His mangled torso has two gunshot wounds, blood gushes out of them like red geysers.

fields.Title: Authority: ""There... behind..." You hear your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There... behind..." You hear your bloody lips mumble, but he does not understand. He does not look into your eyes and see the fear there. He does not trust you.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "The pain flows over your entire bod..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pain flows over your entire body like an awful shock. A grim knowing rises from within -- half of your body must be gone.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "The Hardie boys are yelling. Someon..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Hardie boys are yelling. Someone is running, jumping over you. In the background you hear gunfire shatter glass -- and then a man in pain. A familiar sound.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Shoot him in the mouth. Shoot him b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shoot him in the mouth. Shoot him before he shoots you.

fields.Title: You: "Who broke my heart?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who broke my heart?

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Eventually we all do, Harry."
fields.Dialogue Text: Eventually we all do, Harry.

fields.Title: You: "(Shout.) "Stop shooting at me!""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Shout.) "Stop shooting at me!"

fields.Title: You: "I don't care. Fuck me."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't care. Fuck me.

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, I lied. About not remembering..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, I lied. About not remembering who I am. I made it up... I remember everything."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" The lieutenant push..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay with me!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "You hear me?! Stay awake! Look at me!"

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "This is the mercenary at the gates!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is the mercenary at the gates! His chest rises and falls under the ceramic breastplate. His fingers reach for the butt of his sidearm.

fields.Title: You: "So which one is it, who's right?"
fields.Dialogue Text: So which one is it, who's right?

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Scream IMMEDIATELY! He's gonna die."
fields.Dialogue Text: Scream IMMEDIATELY! He's gonna die.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a bit. Get under his skin.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Drink beer, drink wine, drink cider..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Drink beer, drink wine, drink cider, go to parties with young people around and drink beer *and* cider; do drugs too, so you don't fall asleep... You had *some* fun. But not enough to heal you.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Do it, primitive..." He points to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do it, primitive..." He points to his chest. "Take me out."

fields.Title: You: ""... Fuck me, I forgot the bullets...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... Fuck me, I forgot the bullets." (Just stand there.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("spirit_bomb") == false  and  CheckItem("bullet") == false  and  (CheckItem("gun_villiers")  or  CheckItem("gun_ruby"))

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""They teach you to shoot the chest..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They teach you to shoot the chest in copland? Stupid fuck..." The man shrugs and turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

fields.Title: You: "No!!! Kim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No!!! Kim...

fields.Title: You: "Look at Kortenaer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look at Kortenaer.

fields.Title: You: "Blink -- think!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Blink -- think!

fields.Title: Half Light: "Here it comes. Death."
fields.Dialogue Text: Here it comes. Death.

fields.Title: You: "Wait! Uh... what's the story betwee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait! Uh... what's the story between us?!

fields.Title: De Paule: ""Oh, people are gonna die today. We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, people are gonna die today. We're not leaving it like this. These *tribals* hung him up for everyone to see..."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kortenaer: ""You think I care what that company..."]
Beautiful Necktie: "It's good to see you still have cap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's good to see you still have capacity for compassion my friend. Deep down you are a good man.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "This is it. I'm gonna hit the groun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is it. I'm gonna hit the ground and burn away now. Most of the people in this yard are gonna die -- if not all. Probably you too. It's a COMPLETE DISASTER.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "An Ister AR-FA7, built for taking o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An Ister AR-FA7, built for taking out light armoured vehicles. It will devastate you.

fields.Title: You: "Let it happen."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let it happen.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Most of what's down there."
fields.Dialogue Text: Most of what's down there.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "No. No. It's just a fear. Even if....."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. No. It's just a fear. Even if... who cares. No one wants you anyway.

fields.Title: You: "Do nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do nothing.

fields.Title: You: "No, he's calming down. I can talk t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, he's calming down. I can talk to him.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This time feels different. You aim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This time feels different. You aim higher -- as if pulled by a magnet. Your hand goes numb from the explosion and a plume of smoke erupts from the gun...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Wait. It's a good thing you have an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait. It's a good thing you have an anthropomorphic petrol bomb. It really is. But you have to soften him up first. Present an argument!

fields.Title: Half Light: "There's no way, you're just gonna d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no way, you're just gonna die. Just close your eyes when it happens...

fields.Title: You: ""I shouldn't have called her. Now s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I shouldn't have called her. Now she hates me."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "Around you -- time starts moving ag..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Around you -- time starts moving again, the sounds of violence and panic.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "From the corner of your eye you see..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From the corner of your eye you see the lieutenant raise his pistol -- and aim it at Ruud.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Easy, Lizzie..." His voice is almo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, Lizzie..." His voice is almost gentle. "Let me handle it. I know guys like this. I'm sure we can come to a peaceful agreement. Ain't that right, fellas?"

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. You feel your fists contract, as you stand there, between these men -- all carrying real weapons.

fields.Title: You: "He got what was coming for him."
fields.Dialogue Text: He got what was coming for him.

fields.Title: Garte, the Cafeteria Manager: ""STOP!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "STOP!!!"

fields.Title: You: ""Everyone knows I made it up. I'm j..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone knows I made it up. I'm just a drunk. A stupid dead drunk."

fields.Title: You: ""There's a white shadow that smells..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's a white shadow that smells like apricots, it's... always there."
fields.Alternate1: "There is a black echo. It smells like apricots and it's... always there."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsTHCPresent("caustic_echo")  or  IsTHCPresent("white_mourning")  or  Variable["coast.payphone_dolores_call_done"] == true  or  Variable["inventory.ledger_caustic_echo"]  or  Variable["inventory.ledger_white_mourning"]

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "The big one is the damn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "The big one is the damn *scab leader*."
fields.Alternate1: (Whisper.) "The big one is the damn *scab leader*."

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "All right! END GAME. Light me on fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: All right! END GAME. Light me on fire and throw me in his face!

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time people will die."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you waste time people will die.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""What's the matter, loincloth? Mout..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the matter, loincloth? Mouth full of dick?" He croaks. "Think I'm gonna fucking spare you?!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""Everyone is so evil.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everyone is so evil."

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Brother, you already *were* a ghost..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Brother, you already *were* a ghost. Up there, screaming -- along with all of them. Scaring each other. Haunting each other.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," the lieutenant says firmly. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," the lieutenant says firmly. "We have to step in. This is not going to end well if we don't..."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "A low shot rings. You feel a tappin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A low shot rings. You feel a tapping, like rain on your chest plate. Heavy drops of rain. Then the sound of dice rolling, as the cuirass distributes the shot evenly from plate to plate.

fields.Title: Authority: ""No," you scream: "BEHIND YOU!" fro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No," you scream: "BEHIND YOU!" from your bloody lips. Your eyes are full of fear.

fields.Title: You: "Throw the gun at him: "Die!""
fields.Dialogue Text: Throw the gun at him: "Die!"

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "His lips -- moving, swollen with fe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His lips -- moving, swollen with fear -- are trying to say: 'Shoot him, shoot him!', but he can't.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "OH GOD! WATCH OUT!"
fields.Dialogue Text: OH GOD! WATCH OUT!

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Your heart is broken, *bratushka*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your heart is broken, *bratushka*. And it cannot be mended. Believe me, I've tried.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""You're all drunk, come to your sen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're all drunk, come to your senses!" She sounds very sure of herself. "You won't gun down seven people in the middle of the street. This isn't a frontier town or a jungle outpost."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly your fingers holding the grip of a gun, that has just taken a life, tingle... Go for it, it seems to say.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Wow you threw it far -- great throw..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wow you threw it far -- great throw. Too bad the goal was to throw it a very *short* distance and now everyone will die.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ssshhhhh...." The lieutenant raise..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ssshhhhh...." The lieutenant raises his left hand.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""I'm all out of shits to give, loin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm all out of shits to give, loincloth." There's a feverish gleam in his eyes. "Welcome to the fucking reckoning."

fields.Title: You: ""We're out of time. This is...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're out of time. This is..."

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No, wait! It's good you have that g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, wait! It's good you have that gun. It really is. Just soften him up first. Present an argument!

fields.Title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know about this getting under his skin... He'll only get under *yours*. I'm barely keeping you together here. This is *it*.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "You got hit. The armour took most o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You got hit. The armour took most of it, but still your rib cage burns. Feels like blood is slowly seeping into your lungs...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The look of vengeance. Framed by me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The look of vengeance. Framed by melting skin. This is the last thing he will do on Earth -- but he *will* do it. He will end you.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You're thirsty. Reach for the glass..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're thirsty. Reach for the glass of water by the bed. The world is still there. Sleep some more...

fields.Title: De Paule: "You hear a faint scream -- a woman'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a faint scream -- a woman's. Then the sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The woman is gone. So is Kim. Then the whole world...

fields.Title: De Paule: "You hear a faint scream -- a woman'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a faint scream -- a woman's. Then the sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The woman is gone. So is Kim. Then the whole world...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Get lost, comedian. You cops had y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Get lost, comedian. You cops had your chance. Now it's fucking time for some justice." He licks his lips, waving his gun at the crowd. Losing his balance for a moment, he staggers backward.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "'I only ever wanted you to have fun..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'I only ever wanted you to have fun, Harry!' it calls out to you. One last time.

fields.Title: You: "Look through the smoke rising from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look through the smoke rising from the barrel.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The smoke drifts west with the wind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The smoke drifts west with the wind. You hear the plaza erupt in violence, slow, like a waterfall in reverse.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "*What's going to happen now?* Every..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *What's going to happen now?* Everyone's going to die, what do you think is going to happen?

fields.Title: You: "Thanks, coach!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Thanks, coach!

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Just dodge the first shot -- and th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just dodge the first shot -- and the second will be easier. Drunks are quick to anger -- and make mistakes.

fields.Title: You: "He is, he's about to snap!"
fields.Dialogue Text: He is, he's about to snap!

fields.Title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm barely keeping you together here. The more you talk the harder it will get, I'm afraid...

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Joopson AS catalogue no. J327 shone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Joopson AS catalogue no. J327 shone on the tie rack, trying to get his attention. The sad man picked it up and put it on. He looked at himself in the mirror. Didn't smile.

fields.Title: Endurance: "You're bleeding like a pig, but the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're bleeding like a pig, but the bullet *seems* to have gone right through you. Don't go into shock and you might make it.

fields.Title: Volition: "He can't go. Not before the case is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He can't go. Not before the case is solved.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "A volcano of burning pain erupts fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A volcano of burning pain erupts from your left shoulder.

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Eugene, to your right! Don't let h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Eugene, to your right! Don't let him..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Like a pillow, he falls on you. Col..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like a pillow, he falls on you. Cold nylon and blood slumped on you, as the lights go out. All the lights. The last thing you hear is the sound of his spectacles landing on the pavement next to you.

fields.Title: You: "What parts of me are... missing?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What parts of me are... missing?

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You..." Kortenaer turns his bloods..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You..." Kortenaer turns his bloodshot eyes to you.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "You can also feel bone where the bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can also feel bone where the bullet went in. Something very sharp, like broken teeth under your fingers.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "... it's all gone. Open your eyes n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... it's all gone. Open your eyes now. You have to see what's happening!

fields.Title: You: ""Live fast... die *old*." (Wince fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Live fast... die *old*." (Wince from pain)

fields.Title: Authority: ""NO," you say, and hand out your fi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "NO," you say, and hand out your firearm to him. Your hand trembles and your eyes are full of fear.

fields.Title: Half Light: "No, he didn't -- he's about to open..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, he didn't -- he's about to open fire.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "To your left you hear the lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To your left you hear the lieutenant cock his gun.

fields.Title: Composure: "Yes, yes! Just shoot him. I'm barel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, yes! Just shoot him. I'm barely keeping you together here -- no time to talk. He will only rattle you.

fields.Title: You: "I know so little about you. How did..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I know so little about you. How did we meet?

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "And from that moment on -- we rode..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And from that moment on -- we rode together. The rest of your clothes were still *normal* back then. But we took care of that soon enough.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Harry, for god's sake... WATCH OUT!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Harry, for god's sake... WATCH OUT!

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "It's not easy. He has 0.4 seconds t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not easy. He has 0.4 seconds to do so. He won't make it. You're on your own.

fields.Title: You: ""She would've started loving me aga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "She would've started loving me again... but I called her and now she won't."
fields.Alternate1: "She would have started loving me again but I called her and now she won't."

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "Of course. I know you do. Everybody..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course. I know you do. Everybody leaves, when they get the chance. Go on, keep falling. Deeper... take the door.

fields.Title: You: ""You're all drunk, look at yourselv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're all drunk, look at yourselves!"

fields.Title: Limbic System: "It's *STILL* not over, he's hurting..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's *STILL* not over, he's hurting now. Deep inside, the minuscule matter which you are composed of persists. The ride never ends. It just gets harder.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Think you can hang our brother and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Think you can hang our brother and then just fucking *talk* your way out of it?" His eyes flash.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "You stare down the barrel of the gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stare down the barrel of the gun. You see Ruud's mask behind it -- his eye in the slit of the helmet. Like a camera lens focusing on you.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Shit, this is it. Tell him anything..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shit, this is it. Tell him anything, tell him you have more information!

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "WATCH OUT! To your left, de Paule i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: WATCH OUT! To your left, de Paule is about to take a shot too -- at Kim!

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*Kipt* is a pejorative term used to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Kipt* is a pejorative term used to describe people of Semenese descent.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Don't thank *me*, you did this!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't thank *me*, you did this!

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "The helmet looks like the face of a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The helmet looks like the face of an ancient god of war, crying blood.

fields.Title: Authority: ""Shoot... dead." You hear your bloo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shoot... dead." You hear your bloody lips mumble. You try to give him your gun, so he'd understand. But he does not. He does not look into your eyes and see the fear there.

fields.Title: You: ""What do we do?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What do we do?"

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "The big one is the merc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "The big one is the mercenary at the gates! The scab leader."
fields.Alternate1: (Whisper.) "The big one is the mercenary at the gates!"

fields.Title: You: "Did we... have any fun?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Did we... have any fun?

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "It's not easy. He has 0.6 seconds t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not easy. He has 0.6 seconds to do so. He won't make it. You're on your own.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "The fight? There is no fight. The f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The fight? There is no fight. The fight is over -- it was lost. A thousand years ago. You have laid here forever. Keep falling. Deeper... take the door.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A plume of smoke and fire erupts fr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A plume of smoke and fire erupts from the gun and your hand goes numb from the explosion...

fields.Title: You: "Evade the shot."
fields.Dialogue Text: Evade the shot.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "The Hardie boys are screaming, figh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Hardie boys are screaming, fighting, dying. Someone jumps over you -- nearby gunfire shatters glass.

fields.Title: You: "Kim! Where is Kim?!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim! Where is Kim?!

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: "It's Titus. With a splat like meat,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's Titus. With a splat like meat, you hear bullets rip into him. His voice, still giving orders, grows fainter... A gurgle...

fields.Title: You: ""Go ahead then. Kill me then. I *wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead then. Kill me then. I *want* to die."

fields.Title: You: ""He's dangerous...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "He's dangerous..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Uh, what?" The lieutenant quickly..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Uh, what?" The lieutenant quickly glances at you.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "She doesn't seem to understand the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: She doesn't seem to understand the severity of the situation.

fields.Title: You: "This is gonna be fun."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is gonna be fun.

fields.Title: You: ""God dammit. I did my best. I just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "God dammit. I did my best. I just need more time to solve the murder."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "He's *not* taking it. His body is n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's *not* taking it. His body is not taking it. Oh god, no, he's not disintegrating -- he's swelling up instead. Over the hours. Hurting. Moaning in his sleep.

fields.Title: You: "Shoot him again."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shoot him again.

fields.Title: You: "Throw the gun at him: "Die!""
fields.Dialogue Text: Throw the gun at him: "Die!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is no room for hesitation. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant turns around and fires, his body falling on yours in the course of the motion...

fields.Title: You: "(Whisper.) "Let's walk away for now..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Whisper.) "Let's walk away for now."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're bleeding out!" Nothing. Dar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're bleeding out!" Nothing. Darkness, blurring lights of pain. Out of it, a silhouette emerges -- crouching over you. A familiar voice, filled with urgency and fear.
fields.Alternate1: "You're bleeding out!" Out of it -- a silhouette appears, crouching over you. You hear a familiar voice filled with urgency and fear.

fields.Title: You: "Good, I want to die."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good, I want to die.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "You were a sad drunk who bought an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You were a sad drunk who bought an ugly tie -- who gives a shit! Everyone is going to die because our plan failed. I have *no idea* how you're gonna get out of this. No idea.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""What's the matter, loincloth? Got..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the matter, loincloth? Got your mouth full of dick?" He croaks. "Think I'm gonna spare you?! My brother is dead..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "He's not gonna make it."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's not gonna make it.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This third one -- he is the most da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This third one -- he is the most dangerous of them all. Heavily armed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My plan is not to get killed." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My plan is not to get killed." He puts his hand on his holster. "But we have to intervene."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time, people will die...."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you waste time, people will die. And they will still attack you later.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This third one -- he is the most da..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This third one -- he is the most dangerous of them all. Heavily armed.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out. In the background, the leader is still on fire...

fields.Title: You: "Light the spirit bomb and launch it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Light the spirit bomb and launch it at him.
fields.tooltip10: He's thinking he's a bad leader.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "You leap left. A swarm of angry lea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You leap left. A swarm of angry lead passes mere millimetres from your side, tearing fabric off your coat. Feels like the lightest of tucks.
fields.Alternate1: You leap left. A swarm of angry lead-hornets passes mere millimetres from your side. Feels like they're almost touching your naked skin.
fields.Alternate2: You leap left. A swarm of angry lead-hornets passes mere millimetres from your side, tearing fabric off your shirt. Feels like the lightest of tucks.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "A small explosion expels the bullet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A small explosion expels the bullet from the chamber. With a puff of smoke it hits the man square in the chest -- producing a soft clicking sound in the armour.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "But you can't. It's so hard. Your e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: But you can't. It's so hard. Your eyelids grow heavy and the sounds ever more distant. And a cold comes over you. The lieutenant, too, is somewhere far away. Almost gone... when suddenly! You sense something behind him...

fields.Title: Ancient Reptilian Brain: "This is death. One more door, baby...."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is death. One more door, baby. One more door.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "The man tilts his head, trying to s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man tilts his head, trying to see through the clearing smoke -- for the *next* shot.

fields.Title: You: "(Try to open your eyes.) What do I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Try to open your eyes.) What do I see?

fields.Title: You: "Good bye, necktie!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Good bye, necktie!

fields.Title: You: ""Easy now... No one needs to die he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy now... No one needs to die here today..."

fields.Title: You: ""I can see you're drunk.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can see you're drunk."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He's trying to find a straight line..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's trying to find a straight line of sight before the rifleman can take you out.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He's drunk. Drunk fighters over-cor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's drunk. Drunk fighters over-correct. Move right -- he aims further right. Get him to overshoot!

fields.Title: You: "I cannot be killed. I have become *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I cannot be killed. I have become *immortal*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Liquid parts mostly, and you're qui..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Liquid parts mostly, and you're quickly running out of them. There is a major artery on the inside of the thigh...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stay with me!" You feel burning ho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Stay with me!" You feel burning hot tears streaming from your eyes.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Peace. Always peace -- it has worke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Peace. Always peace -- it has worked thus far. Start with the first idea you have, move down from that, please...

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's *a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even if it comes to a fight it's *always* a good idea to drag it out. Get under his skin.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "My name, should you know it, is Joo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: My name, should you know it, is Joopson AS Men's Fashion, model "Colourful Tie." Catalogue no. J327.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Let me help you then..." The man l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let me help you then..." The man looks to his left. "Kill him."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Titus -- behind you -- must be aimi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Titus -- behind you -- must be aiming at him right now. Don't forget, there's additional reinforcements. Just survive this...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The look of vengeance. Framed in bl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The look of vengeance. Framed in blood, lips shaking. This is the last thing he'll do on Earth -- but he *will* do it. He is your end.

fields.Title: You: ""This is a stupid world...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a stupid world..."

fields.Title: You: ""Please call her, Kim.... She won't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Please call her, Kim.... She won't listen to me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A big pillow falls on you. Cold nyl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A big pillow falls on you. Cold nylon and blood. Slumped on you as the lights go out. All the lights. And the sounds. Of the world. Disappear.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "It was *him*. *He* is the infernal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was *him*. *He* is the infernal engine. He never stops. He only gets worse.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The weapon bounces off his shoulder..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The weapon bounces off his shoulder. He turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "That's all it takes. There is no ro..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's all it takes. There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant moves, like a spring unloaded. He grabs the gun from your bloody hand and fires behind him.

fields.Title: You: "Shoot Kortenaer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shoot Kortenaer.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("bullet")  and  (CheckItem("gun_villiers")  or  CheckItem("gun_ruby"))  and  CheckItem("spirit_bomb") == false

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "No. It's off. *Way* off. I told you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. It's off. *Way* off. I told you.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" The voice from bene..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" The voice from beneath the helmet interrupts your thoughts. You only make out the last word.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The weapon bounces off his shoulder..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The weapon bounces off his shoulder. He turns to his left and says: "Kill him."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Ruud..." The man looks to his left..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ruud..." The man looks to his left. "Kill him."

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is genuinely worried..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is genuinely worried for his life. You should consult him before getting in there.

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""No one is going to kill anyone. Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one is going to kill anyone. Let's just put the guns down and talk like civilized human beings."

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "With a wordless gurgle, the killer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a wordless gurgle, the killer loads his long rifle...

fields.Title: You: "Am I going to stay like this foreve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Am I going to stay like this forever?

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "You both did, *bratan* -- deep down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You both did, *bratan* -- deep down you know it was the both of you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If this turns into a firefight, we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If this turns into a firefight, we should take him out first." He nods.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "There's something very wrong with h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something very wrong with him.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word you can make out.

fields.Title: Composure: "Yes, yes! Just throw the bomb at hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, yes! Just throw the bomb at him. I'm barely keep you together here -- no time to talk. He will only rattle you.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Peace. Always peace -- it has worke..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Peace. Always peace -- it has worked thus far. Start with the first idea you have, then move down from that, please...

fields.Title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "In the fiery inferno you see your t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the fiery inferno you see your tie -- coiling around the man's neck. It is no longer horrific, but beautiful and *pure*.

fields.Title: Volition: "No. Not a disaster. Weave this into..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Not a disaster. Weave this into the story of you. Walk out of its *ruins*. Save those who still can be saved -- *I'm* on your side.

fields.Title: You: "I'm young again."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm young again.

fields.Title: You: ""Why did I not find my lost gun..."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why did I not find my lost gun..." (Just stand there.)

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("spirit_bomb") == false  and  CheckItem("gun_villiers") == false  and  CheckItem("gun_ruby") == false

fields.Title: Authority: "He doesn't want to. But he must."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't want to. But he must.

fields.Title: You: "Stand there quietly; hope nothing b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stand there quietly; hope nothing bad happens.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "With a crash of shattering glass an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With a crash of shattering glass and a terrible roar the fire draws in oxygen -- the bomb hits the mercenary in the chest,  swallowing him in flames as he staggers backward.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "IT'S A *FIASCO*, BRATAN!"
fields.Dialogue Text: IT'S A *FIASCO*, BRATAN!

fields.Title: You: "Who screamed?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who screamed?

fields.Title: You: "Look him in the eye."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look him in the eye.
fields.Alternate1: Look the burning man in the eye.

fields.Title: You: ""Of course... I get gunned down and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course... I get gunned down and die. Sorry fuck..."

fields.Title: You: "What's going on with *that* guy?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's going on with *that* guy?

fields.Title: You: ""Me and Kim are gonna fucking murde..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Me and Kim are gonna fucking murder you!"

fields.Title: Elizabeth: ""This is a misunderstanding. Nothin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a misunderstanding. Nothing irreversible has happened yet. You can just return to your unit and forget all about this."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He has to. The rifleman will fire a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He has to. The rifleman will fire at you again.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""Peaceful..." It sounds like the ar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Peaceful..." It sounds like the armoured figure is weeping.

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: ""...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...*PIGFUCK!*" is the only word you can make out. It doesn't sound calm.

fields.Title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know about this getting under his skin. What if he gets under *yours*? I'm barely keeping your hand from trembling here...

fields.Title: Empathy: "No, please. Peace -- it has worked..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, please. Peace -- it has worked this far. Start with the first idea you have, move down from that...

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Even at this distance, you can stil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even at this distance, you can still make out the ugly tie suspended in blue liquid. It looks extremely worried.

fields.Title: You: "Like how did I get you, or...?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Like how did I get you, or...?

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Get ready for a world of pain, man."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get ready for a world of pain, man.

fields.Title: You: "Nothing will ever heal me, but at l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing will ever heal me, but at least I'll have a funny tie.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "The kinetic energy of the 9mm front..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The kinetic energy of the 9mm front-loaded bullet is distributed evenly across the chest piece and into his hands.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't want to be anymore. It hur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't want to be anymore. It hurts."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Life gets haaaaaaaaaard. But we go..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Life gets haaaaaaaaaard. But we go ooooooooooooooon...

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "An unbelievable shot from the lieut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: An unbelievable shot from the lieutenant.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "I bet you are... The fiery containe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I bet you are... The fiery container hurtles toward the earth with a last wink of light. It shatters to a thousand pieces.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There is no room for hesitation. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no room for hesitation. The lieutenant turns around and fires, his body falling on yours in the course of the motion...

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "To your right, the killer raises hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To your right, the killer raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His moves are steady, but the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...
fields.Alternate1: The porcelain man raises his rifle and takes aim at you. His hands are steady, and the long barrel of the rifle sways slowly...

fields.Title: Ruud Hoenkloewen: "Blood gushes from the helmet's eye-..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Blood gushes from the helmet's eye-sockets as Ruud staggers back, disoriented. The sounds coming from his helmet are not human.

fields.Title: You: ""Gunned down in the line of duty......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gunned down in the line of duty... it's okay."

fields.Title: You: "May he find peace in death."
fields.Dialogue Text: May he find peace in death.
fields.Alternate1: May he find peace by his brother.
fields.Alternate2: May he find peace by his stepbrother.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Feels slick and warm with blood. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Feels slick and warm with blood. The pain is too strong to know what has happened there. Even clutching to your consciousness takes everything you got.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Oh yes he is, he's about to snap an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes he is, he's about to snap and shoot someone right now.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""We're gonna tear right through you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're gonna tear right through you, I don't give a shit if you're cops."

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Another soft explosion, like a fire..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Another soft explosion, like a firecracker goes off in your hand. Another soft *click* from the gleaming white cuirass.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The man it was supposed to hit is l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The man it was supposed to hit is looking over his shoulder -- to see where it went. And he can't see it! It's THAT OFF.

fields.Title: Composure: "Normal police officer clothes just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Normal police officer clothes just don't go well with a multi-patterned disco tie made of 98.7% pure flammable polyester.

fields.Title: You: ""I can't forget it. Even when I dra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't forget it. Even when I drank so much..."

fields.Title: You: "Will I be a... ghost now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Will I be a... ghost now?

fields.Title: Limbic System: "And rotting. And being disinfected...."
fields.Dialogue Text: And rotting. And being disinfected. And smelling of drugs and feeling saliva in his mouth. Drifting in painkillers. Thrashing in his wound sleep.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Hours turn to days. Soon he will ge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hours turn to days. Soon he will get up again and go through it -- again! Again! Finally, we know what the infernal engine was, outside -- the clarion call...

fields.Title: Limbic System: "Kim? There is no Kim. There is no f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim? There is no Kim. There is no fight, it's over -- it *was*...

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "You hear a roar of pain. A death sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a roar of pain. A death scream. The sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The hulking figure too is gone. And so is Kim. And the whole world.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "You hear a roar of pain. A death sc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear a roar of pain. A death scream. The sound disappears, like someone pressed STOP on the tape. The hulking figure too is gone. And so is Kim. And the whole world.

fields.Title: You: ""The Wild Pines rep does not approv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The Wild Pines rep does not approve of this!"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "You can't. There is no time. Someth..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't. There is no time. Something inside your pelvis explodes. Your entire lower body is on fire and your legs can't support you... you fall down like a rag doll.
fields.Alternate1: You simply blink. Then something inside your pelvis explodes. Your entire lower body is on fire and your legs can't support you... you fall down like a rag doll.

fields.Title: De Paule: "A slender white shadow, towering. S..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A slender white shadow, towering. Someone stands there -- raising her pistol at him. The lieutenant does not see it. He's pushing down on your wound with both hands...

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "The pain is too immense to scream...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pain is too immense to scream. It pushes the air out of your lungs. Everything goes dark, a distant blur as you recede into it...

fields.Title: You: "Listen... *through* the darkness an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Listen... *through* the darkness and the pain.

fields.Title: You: "Wait!!! I didn't even know your nam..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait!!! I didn't even know your name!

fields.Title: You: ""Where is Klaasje? She can explain..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where is Klaasje? She can explain this."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "The leader gives a small nod to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The leader gives a small nod to the helmeted man. Suddenly the blue medicinal spirit in your hand seems to have a pulsating glow. It feels enticing somehow...

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "He's aiming for the eye-slot in Ruu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's aiming for the eye-slot in Ruud's helmet. An extremely difficult shot...

fields.Title: You: "Oh god..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh god...

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "See you on the other side... The ne..."
fields.Dialogue Text: See you on the other side... The necktie disintegrates into molten heat, its last remaining embers letting out a pop and crack that sounds like:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, she was right... That must b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck, she was right... That must be the *third* mercenary..."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""SHUT UP!!! You're not gonna talk y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "SHUT UP!!! You're not gonna talk yourself out of this, loincloth-shit fuck!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""... the mercenary tribunal." The l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... the mercenary tribunal." The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: You: ""One wrong move and I'm taking you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "One wrong move and I'm taking you out."

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""You're probably gonna get killed t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're probably gonna get killed too... I think I'm gonna kill you. I didn't think I had it in me to kill a cop..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "To your left, you hear the lieutena..."
fields.Dialogue Text: To your left, you hear the lieutenant cock his gun.

fields.Title: Composure: "I'm barely keeping you together her..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm barely keeping you together here. If you talk to him, he will rattle *you*, not the other way around.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, there are *three* of them......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck, there are *three* of them... I was hoping there would be... less." The lieutenant points to the helmeted figure.

fields.Title: You: ""Who is that?" (Point to the man) "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who is that?" (Point to the man) "I didn't know you had a third guy."
fields.Alternate1: "You've brought backup." (Point to the masked man.) "From outta town."

fields.Title: Authority: "He is facing overwhelmingly superio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is facing overwhelmingly superior firepower -- and he knows it.

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "One day a sad man walked into a clo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: One day a sad man walked into a clothing store. He looked really down. Like he hadn't had fun in years. He needed someone to show him how to rock and roll again.

fields.Title: You: ""Listen! They didn't do it!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Listen! They didn't do it!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck, there's a third one... How d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck, there's a third one... How did we miss something like this?" The lieutenant points to the helmeted figure.

fields.Title: You: ""Kill me and you'll never find out..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kill me and you'll never find out who killed your colonel. I've been withholding information."
fields.Alternate1: "Kill me and you'll never find out who killed your stepbrother. I've been withholding information."
fields.Alternate2: "Kill me and you'll never find out who killed your brother. I've been withholding information."

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "'I feel it in my fingers... I feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 'I feel it in my fingers... I feel it in my toes...'

fields.Title: Empathy: "He is. I was wrong."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is. I was wrong.

fields.Title: Half Light: "You can't think that way now, this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You can't think that way now, this is serious.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a little. Get under his skin.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "No, no. It's okay. Soften him up an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no. It's okay. Soften him up and trust the others to attack if it comes to that. Make him talk! Present an argument!

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kortenaer: ""Who the fuck is that?""]
Titus Hardie: ""The cop! Protect the cop, he's dow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The cop! Protect the cop, he's down..."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "There is a radio in the distance. A..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is a radio in the distance. A radio of the world. Playing sounds: Good morning, Elysium. Soon you will return to the world.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Go ahead. Give it another try." Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Go ahead. Give it another try." The man doesn't even move. Hes smiling.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""God, please..." the lieutenant say..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "God, please..." the lieutenant says quietly, without trembling. He aims, face pale...

fields.Title: You: "Touch your lower body..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Touch your lower body...

fields.Title: You: ""No one wants to *do* anything with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No one wants to *do* anything with me... no one wants to party with me."

fields.Title: You: ""The wolf is at the door, Kim. He w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The wolf is at the door, Kim. He will eat the sun."

fields.Title: You: "Just let the darkness take you."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just let the darkness take you.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "It's not all dark yet. As you're le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not all dark yet. As you're leaving, *he* is in there too, with you. You can *feel* the figure move. And then a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth. Muffled.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "This guy? Well -- his face has *cra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This guy? Well -- his face has *cracked open* into a scream of terror. It looks like he's performing some sort of a shamanistic dance... that requires you to be on fire?!

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, what's going on here?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, what's going on here?"

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "You really, really should have a gu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You really, really should have a gun in your hand by now -- or *something* dangerous. This feels *scary*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He just shakes his head, still crou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He just shakes his head, still crouched over you. You hear a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth -- a red circle has appeared on the lieutenant's jacket. It's growing fast.

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "0.4 seconds remain. There are six l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 0.4 seconds remain. There are six little black dots in the tip of the barrel, like a honeycomb. This is a *nock cannon*. It shoots six rounds in one pull of the trigger.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "You hear me?! Stay awake!"

fields.Title: Endurance: "God, you're so frail. Too frail to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: God, you're so frail. Too frail to think further, time is running out...

fields.Title: You: "Fall into total darkness."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fall into total darkness.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "Nothing. A persisting darkness. Dan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing. A persisting darkness. Dancing lights of pain. Distant shadows cast by them, like a hellish play...

fields.Title: You: "Kim -- did he hit the rifleman?!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Kim -- did he hit the rifleman?!

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing, cross your arms."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing, cross your arms.

fields.Title: Kortenaer: ""Oh yeah, welcome to the fucking pa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh yeah, welcome to the fucking party." He looks around. "You're probably gonna get killed too, I don't give a shit if you're cops."

fields.Title: You: ""It's so dark... I can't see anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's so dark... I can't see anything."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsTHCFixed("superstar_cop")  == false  and  IsTHCFixed("apocalypse_cop")  == false  and  IsTHCFixed("boring_cop") == false  and  IsTHCFixed("sorry_cop") == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant pushes down on your wound, hard. "Stay awake! Look at me!"

fields.Title: De Paule: "It's not all dark yet. As you're le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not all dark yet. As you're leaving, she is in there too with you. You can *feel* the slender figure move, like a snake. And then a distant gunshot. Velvety smooth. Muffled.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Even if it comes to a fight it's *a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even if it comes to a fight it's *always* a good idea to drag it out first. Get under his skin.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

fields.Title: Suggestion: "No. We can do this. Drag it out a b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. We can do this. Drag it out a bit. Get under his skin.

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "What?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What?

fields.Title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "0.6 seconds remain. There are six l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: 0.6 seconds remain. There are six little black dots in the tip of the thick barrel, like a honeycomb. This is a *nock cannon*. It shoots six rounds in one pull of the trigger.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "And the lieutenant too. And the men..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And the lieutenant too. And the men behind your back, drawing their weapons... you can live. You can get out of this.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "No, no. It was her mostly. Don't li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no. It was her mostly. Don't lie to him, necktie.

fields.Title: Perception (Smell): "Smells like a steak on the grill. T..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Smells like a steak on the grill. The burning flesh in your nostrils....

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Yeah, his body contorts in a very d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, his body contorts in a very disturbing manner -- there's no mincing words with this one. He's dying a horrible painful death as you're talking to your tie in your head.

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes! Keep talking!" The lieutenant..."]
Ancient Reptilian Brain: "It's the living who are ghosts. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's the living who are ghosts. The dead are silent. They don't rattle windows or write letters in blood. The living do. Leave them behind. Rest.

fields.Title: Limbic System: "No. It was *him*. *He* is the infer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. It was *him*. *He* is the infernal engine, can't you see? He never stops. He only gets worse.

fields.Title: You: "Talk about hanged man."
fields.Dialogue Text: Talk about hanged man.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "The shot rings and you stumble. Som..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The shot rings and you stumble. Something violently tugs at your shoulder, pushing you backwards with incredible force.

fields.Title: De Paule: "Then -- two shots ring at once. One..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Then -- two shots ring at once. One from the lieutenant's pistol and the other from De Paule's. It's aimed at the lieutenant, but it misses. You hear a scream behind you...
fields.Alternate1: Then -- two shots ring at once and you hear a scream, but you're too hurt to see, who got hit.

fields.Title: You: "Joy! I am alive!!!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Joy! I am alive!!!

fields.Title: Kortenaer: "A shadow, towering. Someone stands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A shadow, towering. Someone stands there -- raising his pistol at him. The lieutenant does not see it. He's pushing down on your wound with both hands...

fields.Title: You: "What's wrong with me?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What's wrong with me?

fields.Title: Titus Hardie: ""Put your damn gun down." Titus rem..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Put your damn gun down." Titus remains calm. "People are gonna get hurt. We need to talk this through, alright?"

fields.Title: De Paule: ""The kipt is merciful. Willing to s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The kipt is merciful. Willing to spare us if we just forget about our murdered and humiliated commander." Her tone is frighteningly emotionless. "I think we should just kill everyone, Korty."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "A full suit of armour can't be too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A full suit of armour can't be too agile. You can shift direction faster than he can.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""... nest in your abdominal cavity,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "... nest in your abdominal cavity, like a little wild mouse..." The masked man's words are barely intelligible, but you can hear them.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "If you waste time people will die."
fields.Dialogue Text: If you waste time people will die.

fields.Title: Half Light: "Whatever you do -- stop wasting you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Whatever you do -- stop wasting your time *thinking* about it.

fields.Title: Composure: "I don't know about this getting und..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't know about this getting under his skin. What if he gets under *yours*? I'm barely keeping your hand from trembling here...

fields.Title: Beautiful Necktie: "Truthfully? Not a lot. I did everyt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Truthfully? Not a lot. I did everything a multi-patterned necktie can do to help a man. I mean, I tried to get you to do *all* the fun things:

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Like dice rolling."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like dice rolling.

fields.Title: You: ""It didn't do *anything*?" (Look at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It didn't do *anything*?" (Look at the gun.)
